function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased physical interactions in urban areas and cities due to the use of XR technology.","Impact":"Increased risk of outbreaks and transmission of contagious diseases in densely populated areas.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, promote vaccination and use of protective equipment, and limit physical interactions where possible.","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, contactless interfaces, air purification systems.","People":"Urban dwellers, city residents, stakeholders in urban development.","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities, technology developers."}]}
